name: Moshi Monsters™: Moshlings™ Theme Park
description: Your monsterific adventure awaits! The Moshlings have lost their way around Amusement Isle and they need your help to round up their monster-mates and light up the magical Moshlings Theme Park. Find the Lost Moshlings: With 60 Moshlings to find, players get to embark on exciting Moshi Missions to locate and reunite our Moshi friends. Play mini-games to unlock hints and tips to help you in your search. Fun for all ages!: Suitable for a wide range of gamers, with easy-to-learn games and Moshi nature modes for the youngest gamer, as well as exploration puzzles and arcade challenges for the more advanced. Special Nintendo 3DS Features: Nintendo 3DS gamers will pass-and-play against their friends in StreetPass mode, and compete for the golden trophy in highscore challenges and theme park mini-games.
